panels.description: The number of times Node.js restarted.
panels.title: Node.js Restarts

panels.description: The number of processed messages for selected time range

targets.expr: sum((increase(kafka_processed_messages{namespace=~"$namespace", service="$service"}[$__range])) or vector(0)) + sum((increase(requests_counter{namespace=~"$namespace", service="$service", baseUrl=~"/documents.*"}[$__range])) or vector(0))

panels.title: Total Messages

panels.description: Количество документов в очереди на доставку
panels.title: Delivery Queue

targets.expr: sum(max(kafka_high_offset{namespace="$namespace", service="$service"}) by (topic, partition) - max(kafka_current_offset{namespace="$namespace", service="$service"}) by (topic, partition)) by (topic)
sum(max(kafka_high_offset{namespace="$namespace", service="$service"}) by (topic, partition) - max(kafka_current_offset{namespace="$namespace", service="$service"}) by (topic, partition)) by (topic)

sum(increase(http_server_requests_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", url=~"/schema.*|/documents.*|discards.*", service="$service"}[$interval])) by (status) /  scalar(sum(increase(http_server_requests_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", url=~"/schema.*|/documents.*|discards.*", service="$service"}[$interval])))

panels.description: время ответа - p95 и среднее значение

targets.expr: sum(rate(http_server_requests_seconds_sum{namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", service="$service", url=~"/schema.*|/documents.*|discards.*"}[1m])) by (url)/sum(rate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", service="$service", url=~"/schema.*|/documents.*|discards.*"}[$interval])) by (url)

panels.title: HTTP Request Time [$interval]

panels.description: Время подтвержденной доставки в исходящую кафку
panels.title: Delivery Time [$interval]

panels.description: Количество документов и дискардов в очереди на доставку
panels.title: Delivery Queue

panels.description: Количество документов и дискардов в очереди на доставку дольше 5м
panels.title: Delivery Queue Longer 5m

panels.description: Number of active handle and active requests.
panels.title: Active Handlers and Requests

panels.description: время ответа - p95 и среднее значение

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.95, sum(rate(http_server_requests_seconds_bucket{namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", service="$service", url=~"/probe/.*"}[$interval])) by (url, le))

sum(rate(http_server_requests_seconds_sum{namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", url=~"/probe/.*"}[$interval])) by (url)/sum(rate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", service="$service", url=~"/probe/.*"}[$interval])) by (url)

panels.title: HTTP Request Time [$interval]

targets.expr:
(
  sum by (pod) (avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}[$__rate_interval])) 
  * on (pod)
  sum by (pod) (increase(kube_pod_container_status_restarts_total{namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}[$__rate_interval]))
) > 0

sum (
  sum by (pod) (avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{namespace="$namespace", controller=~"$controller", pod=~"$pod"}[$__rate_interval])) 
  * on (pod)
  sum by (pod) (increase(kube_pod_container_status_restarts_total{namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}[$__rate_interval]))
)
